t: Amazon says it’s permanently banned 600 Chinese brands for review fraud | The Verge
s: September 17, 2021 - Following the high-profile disappearances of Aukey, Mpow, RavPower, Choetech and more, Amazon now says it’s cracked down on 3,000 seller accounts across 600 Chinese brands over the past five months.

t: Pukemark, Sweatyrocks, Demonlick: Made-for-Amazon Brand Names Are Getting Ridiculously Surreal
s: October 14, 2020 - I was recently shopping for clothes on Amazon when I noticed bizarre brand names popping up—more bizarre than usual, I mean. It’s common to come across unfamiliar brands on Amazon, where sellers are constantly fashioning product lines and whole brands around what shoppers are searching for.
